title: My Thai dipping sauce
ingredients: ['100g caster sugar', '4 tbsp coconut vinegar or white vinegar', '4 tbsp water', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 tablespoon sweet chilli sauce', '1/2 bunch coriander, chopped', 'pinch of salt', '1 cucumber, finely chopped', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '2 red chillies, seeds removed and finely chopped']
